title: 81/722/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 August 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Akashi- scanning electron microscope, model ISI 100 A' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 August 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as "Akashi - scanning electron microscope, model ISI 100 A" may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties (81/722/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "Akashi - scanning electron microscope, model ISI 100 A", which is the subject of an application by the United Kingdom of 19 February 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 August 1981.
For the Commission
Edgard PISANI
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 184, 15.7.1975, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 134, 31.5.1979, p. 1. (3) OJ No L 318, 13.12.1979, p. 32.
